Articles.Content: I was messing around with that one mod that lets you change the position of KSC (great mod btw I forgot its name) and I had KSC Extended installed, did you know that lil weirdly colored peninsula that KSC is usually on is apparently part of KSC itself? When I was flying around from a space center near the usual KSC, I saw all the usual KK KSC Extended buildings floating. Just wanted to say that.
